import*as types from'../constant/actionTypes';import'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.min.css';import Products from'../data/products';export var getProductList=function getProductList(){return{type:types.GET_ALL_PRODUCT};};export var getList=function getList(){return{type:types.GET_LIST,payload:Products};};export var selectedItem=function selectedItem(productId){return{type:types.SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:{productId:productId}};};export var getSingleItem=function getSingleItem(productId){return{type:types.GET_SINGLE_ITEM,payload:{productId:productId}};};//its all use for cart
export var addToCart=function addToCart(product,qty){return function(dispatch){dispatch(addToCartUnsafe(product,qty));};};export var addToCartAndRemoveWishlist=function addToCartAndRemoveWishlist(product,qty){return function(dispatch){dispatch(addToCartUnsafe(product,qty));};};export var addToCartUnsafe=function addToCartUnsafe(product,qty){return{type:types.ADD_TO_CART,payload:{product:product,qty:qty}};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(product_id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:types.REMOVE_FROM_CART,product_id:product_id});};};export var incrementQty=function incrementQty(product,qty){return function(dispatch){dispatch(addToCartUnsafe(product,qty));};};export var decrementQty=function decrementQty(productId){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:types.DECREMENT_QTY,productId:productId});};};//it seems that I should probably use this as the basis for "Wishlist"
export var addToWishlist=function addToWishlist(product){return function(dispatch){dispatch(addToWishlistUnsafe(product));};};export var addToWishlistUnsafe=function addToWishlistUnsafe(product){return{type:types.ADD_TO_WISHLIST,product:product};};export var removeFromWishlist=function removeFromWishlist(product_id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:types.REMOVE_FROM_WISHLIST,product_id:product_id});};};// Filters
export var filterBrand=function filterBrand(brand){return{type:types.FILTER_BRAND,brand:brand};};export var filterColor=function filterColor(color){return{type:types.FILTER_COLOR,color:color};};export var filterPrice=function filterPrice(value){return{type:types.FILTER_PRICE,value:value};};export var filterSort=function filterSort(sort_by){return{type:types.SORT_BY,payload:sort_by};};// Currency
export var changeCurrency=function changeCurrency(symbol){return{type:types.CHANGE_CURRENCY,symbol:symbol};};
